channel.title: I need a server, source amd client for 508 version+
channel.description: the source needs to be simalar to runescape with npc's spawned along with drops, quest's bosses ect. Please also make it a localhost/127.0.0.1. all I want to do is download, place cache in C: drive and open server for the client to run.

item.title: I need a server, source amd client for 508 version+
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Payment is not permitted on these forums, please read the global and sectional rules before posting.
Also, for future reference, understand that these sort of topics (of course without the offer of payment) would be placed in the Server Downloads section, found here.
